title: Fragment, 17th century
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19.7 x 15.3 cm (7 3/4 x 6 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Green silk ground with an extra weft of silver. Design in rows of two units alternating and changing directions in each row. One motif is an 'S' form; the other a 'C'. The 'S' is in yellow with metal thread; the 'C'  is alternately white and peach.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 17th century.
17th century. Meduim: silk and metallic. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1896-1-70.
